```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library("auditor")
```

# Measures comparison

```{r}
au1 <- audit(champion)
au2 <- audit(challenger)

p <- plot(modelPerformance(au1), modelPerformance(au2))
p$plot_ranking
p$data$value <- round(as.numeric(p$data$value), 4)
kable_styling(kable(p$data), bootstrap_options = "striped")
```

First of all we

```{r}
plot(audit(challenger), audit(champion), type = "ResidualDensity")
plotResidualDensity(audit(challenger), audit(champion))
plotPrediction(audit(challenger), audit(champion), variable = "fare")
plot(audit(challenger), audit(champion), type = "Autocorrelation")
plot(audit(challenger), audit(champion), type = "ScaleLocation")
plotLIFT(audit(challenger), audit(champion))
```
